title: Tell me about a big change in your life.

korean: 제 인생에서 가장 큰 변화는 혼자 살기 시작한 거예요.
대학 졸업하고 취직하면서 부모님 집에서 나왔거든요.
그전까지는 쭉 부모님이랑 살았는데, 처음으로 독립한 거죠.
뭐든지 제 마음대로 할 수 있고, 간섭받지 않으니까요.
근데 막상 혼자 살아보니까 생각보다 힘든 게 많더라고요.
요리, 청소, 빨래 이런 집안일을 다 혼자 해야 하니까요.
특히 아플 때 정말 외롭고 힘들었어요.
월세, 공과금, 식비 다 계산하면 월급이 금방 사라지더라고요.
하지만 이 경험을 통해서 많이 성장한 것 같아요.
책임감도 생기고, 독립적으로 생활하는 법을 배웠으니까요.
english: The biggest change in my life is starting to live alone.
I left my parents' house when I got a job after graduating college.
Until then I had always lived with my parents, so it was my first time being independent.
At first, I was really happy because I was free.
I could do whatever I wanted and wasn't interfered with.
But when I actually lived alone, there were more difficult things than I thought.
Because I had to do all the housework like cooking, cleaning, laundry by myself.
Especially when I was sick, it was really lonely and hard.
When I calculated rent, utility bills, and food expenses, my salary disappeared quickly.
But I think I grew a lot through this experience.
Because I gained a sense of responsibility and learned how to live independently.
